column2: Mark the letter A, B, C, or D on your answer sheet to indicate the word whose underlined part differs from the other three in pronunciation in each of the following questions.

Mark the letter A, B, C, or D on your answer sheet to indicate the word that differs from the other three in the position of primary stress in each of the following questions
A new school________. They hope to finish building it next month.
We object ________ your leaving dinner to take phone calls.
Please take all personal belongings with you ________ leaving the train
It is still unclear ________ the Mayor will accept the recommendations of the City Council.
“Can I carry these suitcases into the room for you?” - “________”
A: “I think it is a good idea to have three or four generations living under one roof. B: “________. Family members can help each other a lot.”
After the flash flood, all the drains were overflowing _____ storm water
The ideas ______ in this essay are not particularly original.
